assets.utilities.match_recorder module¶

class assets.utilities.match_recorder.MatchRecorder(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: object

Class to record the moves during a set of games

Author: Gonzalo Rodríguez Rodríguez

finish_game()¶

Method to save the moves of a game when it is over :return: None

register_move(move)¶

Method to register a move :param move: move to be registered :return: None

save_results(name)¶

Method to save the moves of a set of games when it is over :param name: name of the pickle file to save the moves to :return: None

class assets.utilities.match_recorder.Recorder¶

Bases: type
